title: Android 11, with 3 gesture navigation on, can't access the feature that shows every active app,
content:
After "upgrading" to android 11, i noticed that i couldn't take screenshots just by holding down the power button and selecting the option from the screen.  To fix this, I turned on 3-gesture navigation.

The problem is, when I swipe up, no matter where I swipe up, it just accesses the app drawer and not the active app "cards", if that makes sense.  Everywhere I go it tells me to swipe up and hold, but again, it just accesses the app drawer.  How do I access my active apps?
